text: The 1953 World Table Tennis Championships – Men's Doubles was the 20th edition of the men's doubles championship. Ferenc Sidó and József Kóczián won the title after defeating Richard Bergmann and Johnny Leach in the final by three sets to two. ==Results== ==See also== List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== -
title: 1953 World Table Tennis Championships – Men's Doubles
